verbs.description: Op - ed : President Donald Trump [V: has] been naming conservative judges at a fast pace to the federal bench whose opinions will be heard for years to come .

Op - ed : President Donald Trump has been naming conservative judges at a fast pace to the federal bench whose opinions [V: will] be heard for years to come .
Op - ed : President Donald Trump has been naming conservative judges at a fast pace to the federal bench whose opinions will [V: be] heard for years to come .
